nodes.name: Generate List of Deals by Category

values.content: Generate a list of recommended deals in json list. Classify items by category. Generate the next properties: name, description, price, link and category. All properties will be in a property called: results. Translate texts to english if required.

nodes.notes: This openAi node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: When User Completes Form

parameters.formDescription:
This form returns top deals by your preferences in the same page.

You can schedule your future deals once per day at the end of this test.

nodes.notes: This formTrigger node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

parameters.content:

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation 2

parameters.content:
# Brightdata Workflow

## Overview
Automated workflow: Brightdata Workflow. This workflow processes data and performs automated tasks.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 11
- **Node Types**: 10
- **Error Handling**: ✅ Implemented
- **Security**: ✅ Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: ✅ Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **Get MediaMarkt Offers Website**: brightData
- **Create HTML for Email**: documentGenerator
- **Extract items from results**: splitOut
- **Notify End User by Email**: emailSend
- **Show Form Results Page**: form
- **Extract Body and Title from Website**: html
- **Generate List of Deals by Category**: openAi
- **When User Completes Form**: formTrigger
- **Workflow Documentation**: stickyNote
- **Error Handler for 34df63de**: stopAndError
- ... and 1 more nodes

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible
